message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you have. Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is closer to its true value. I could meet you halfway at $12,000. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your offer. However, considering my budget, I am unable to meet at $12,000. My counteroffer would be $11,000 for the product.
